summary: Director Gil Kofman travels to Xiamen to direct China's first thriller.

reviews.content: You're One Frustrated Voice In A Very Large 1.4-million ppl Crowd, No Wonder No One Is Listen To In China. What Frustration Comes Across As 'Entermaint'  Is Lost A Little With The Destined Inevitably Of Failure Of The Project Depicted In This Doco. An Interesting Fly-On-Wall Experience Tho.
